name: Valerie Tiffany
text:
Food was 5 Star!!! Delish!!
Service was probably the worst I‚Äôve ever had. My father was a restaurant manager his entire career, I‚Äôve been a waitress and I‚Äôm friends with many waitresses. ‚Ä¶More

name: Evan Thomas
text: My wife loves it. As do i

name: Critter Babies
text: First time I was ever able to have pizza. I have dairy and nut allergies and they double checked everything and I was able to get pizza with vegan cheese. It looked so real I was almost afraid to eat it. It was delicious.

name: Jarrett Holder
text: Such a nice Wednesday night treat! Haven't visited a mellow mushroom in a very long time. Wilmington location was outstanding. Sanitation was on point. Service was perfect. Everything was properly timed from apps to salad then our large ‚Ä¶More

name: Jennifer Keck
text: First time dining here.  Food was great, loved the variety of specialty pizzas.  Service was excellent.  Will definitely be coming back.

name: Andrew Hairr
text: The food was pretty good. The outdoor scenery was nice and I liked how it was pet friendly. My only problem is that walking in feels like you fell on a 7/11 men's bathroom floor and all the drugs and bacteria just kicked in.

name: Daniela Diaz
text: Went into Mellow Mushroom yesterday for my brothers 21st birthday and my nephews 1st birthday, had 7 adults, 2 kids and 2 babies. Everyone had a mask on except for my mother. The hostess never greeted us, she simply said that their was only ‚Ä¶More

name: Caroline Beardsley
text: Food is amazing! The portion sizes were pretty good for the prices. I wanted to come here specifically because they offer Vegan cheese. I havent had good vegan pizza in a long time. I got a small pizza and I had to take home some of it. It was so good, and I would definitely recommend coming here.

name: Eric Hoover
text: Did an online order. Online said it would be ready in 20 minutes got there 20 minutes after i order, and when i said o was there to pick up nobody seemed to have any idea what was going. When they finally looked up my order was told it ‚Ä¶More

name: Susan Thornbrough
text: 1st time and we loved it! The Brutos salad was wonderful and large enough to split. The Veg pizza was delicious, loaded with veggies. We split a small. Great service and fast. We will be back!

name: Sunny
text: Their food is so good, me and my family love coming here. They also have vegan options that are yummy.

name: jennifer Johnson
text: First timer from NY....I was very very happy with my pizza....I‚Äôll definitely make it part of my lunch options.  Thank you ü§ó

name: Angela Hough
text: I've lived here my whole life and I've seen mellow mushroom for years, just never went there. I've always heard how good it is and today my boys and I decided to go. We loved it. Just sad I waited so long. Food is absolutely amazing and the service couldn't be better.

name: Derevaun Pham
text: Our visit was great. So happy to be able to sit down in a restaurant and feel like it's just an average day! ‚Ä¶More

name: Sheila Yeager
text: Ate outside...clean, tables followed social distancing rules,  servers wore masks, and were super friendly.  Our dog loved the milk bone!  Thank you.

name: neil rosenberg
text: Good service, say outside, on patio,  ordered custom pizza.  First time eating at this chain..much better then the larger chain pizza restaurant but not the quality of traditional pizza or specialty pizza.

name: Joy Bombay
text: The crew were very nice! Food as always is delicious!

name: Willow Earth
text: I haven't eaten here, but I have delivered food from them for DoorDash. The staff is always friendly- some places aren't delivery driver friendly like this place. It is nice. The atmosphere is chill with yummy food smells :) fast service, too

name: Mark
text: excellent fresh and delicious! great wait staff

name: Robert Bell

name: Justin Devendorf
text: Great good selection of food and just as fun as the other locations I've been

name: Paul W

name: JC Boykin
text: First time going there, very good pizza, would have like more toppings

name: Spence Hackney
text: This is my favorite place in Wilmington.  Great tap selection and you've gotta try the wings!

name: Eric Clooney
text: I love their salad. Their service is also very nice Their staff members are very efficient and fast in their work.

name: James Furr
text: Great pizza and pretzels. Cold beer. Fantastic service by Dakota.

name: Kennard Dilks
text: Coworker ordered the wrong food over the phone and didn't realize it until we arrived. On top of being super friendly and rushing the correct food, they didn't charge us for OUR mistake! Already loved this place for the awesome food and great service, but this is above and beyond!

name: lilah mae
text: It's good but I've had a cleaner restroom

name: Paige Swinson
text: The prices were reasonable. The portion sizes were huge. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful in choosing food due to it being our first time there. The bathroom is very zen and beautiful. I can't wait to go back.

name: Anthony Willingham
text: Pizza good building needing some updating

name: Chad Stoop
text: Nice staff, really good pizza

name: Robin Charlet
text: The servers and hostesses are only super friendly. We ordered a pizza with vegan cheese and the waitress was thoughtful enough to also ask us if we wanted to leave out the butter and Parmesan as well.

name: Teresa Lane
text: Loved their vegan pizza. My picky husband really enjoyed his pizza too. Definitely will eat here again at the next opportunity.

name: Jay Mickler
text: Great food and great service!

name: Katherine Strobietto
text: Food was good but service was below average

name: Pamela Kietzmann
text: The food is outstanding!!! Nothing like it! All of the staff were very friendly and helpful. I love the outdoor seating area.

name: Shawn Sedor
text: Calzone was good. Took too long to get drinks

name: Ian
text: Waited forever for the waitress, waited about 13 mins when they sat another table and their waiter came right away.

name: Alicia Latham
text: The food was great! Definitely get what you pay for. The service was wonderful and the overall environment had a nice atmosphere for people of all ages.

name: Jeff Steiner
text: Very good food. Service was quick. Also very busy. Those 3 things alone together makes this your way better than average pizza shop. I'd personally would give more stars if I could.

name: Joshua Mann
text: First time stopping in for lunch on Veterans Day with my work colleague per her recommendation. ‚Ä¶More

name: jlroach

name: Kemp Burdette
text: Love Mellow! Great food, great beer, great bar staff that remember your name and your favorite beer. And they do a ton for the community!

text: BEST PIZZA IN THE WORLD!!!! I can't believe there are people who have not tried Mello Mushrooms pizza. The house special is amazing!

name: George .Anderson

name: Simon Davis
text: I always enjoy the Mellow Mushroom, but this location seems to have maximized their efficiency. I showed up a mere 15 minutes after ordering (despite them telling me it would take 20) and the pizzas came straight from the oven to my boxes, to my hands. Great speed and great food.

name: Liz Cheesman
text: I love Mellow Mushroom so it really saddens me to only be able to give them 3 stars. Food was excellent as always, but my service couldn't have been more awful. I was by myself (sorry just the way it is sometimes) and my waitress couldn't ‚Ä¶More

name: Franklin Evans
text: Hotwings and pizza was over cooked and burned. Very disappointed.

name: Chelsea Reagan

name: Omar Luna
text: Absolutely the best pizza experience ever! everything at Mellow Mushroom is always great the art the atmosphere and the food! and the shots!!

name: L. Wilson
text: We've been hitting many Mellow Mushrooms recently - always beer and pretzels. Always good,  but these pretzels were the best!

name: Ashley Hoffman

name: Jessica Roe

text: Have been here the number of times for pizza carryout. The food is good, environment good and staff friendly. The only issue I've had is that the orders have not been correct on a number of occasions

text: Always loved this place on Monday with The Penguin's Pengo! Pizza and friendly service are great too. Try the Holy Shitake pizza. Warm and cozy too.

text: After a recent remodeling, this 'shroom is the place for gormet style pizza. Excellent crust, high quality toppings, pretzel bites with beer cheese. The salads - wow.  Full bar and live music.

name: Arlena Roper
text: First, their grade was a 93. We ate there any way but my vegetables on my pizza were raw. If I wanted raw vegetables I would have ordered a salad. Which I did by the way and the dressing was disgusting. The pizza was too for that matter.

name: Miriam Guerrero
text: Nice place and serve for our first time visit

text:
The calzone I ordered was great and gave me lunch for the next day.
If you order the hummus, ask that they heat it up a little. This makes it taste amazing!

text: If you are  pizza lover then here is the place for you.! Wonderful place and astonishing services. Definitely revisit here in free time.

name: Chris Case

text: Nice place. Great food. But not really my style of pizza... very friendly staff all having a great attitude and eagerness to help...

I have gone before with a friend in which we wanted to pay separate and they put us on the same check and I have seen one of the staff yell at some kids who were making a ruckus; but all in all I think the food is amazing, the servers are quite friendly and the outside is the best place to eat.

name: Robert Martin
text: Absolutely the best pizza there is anywhere.

name: Mike Hines
text:
Great food,great service,I tried to fix my own drink when I came to pick my order up,the woman that took my order refused for me to do anything!!
Great, great, great customer service,most definitely will be making this a regular thing

name: Jay Ringenbach
text: People seem to love the place, but it was just okay. Pizza was "good" at best. The bruschetta was excellent though. Fairly priced.

name: Darren Wookiee Russo
text: The food was good as always, how ever the last couple of times I have been there it seems like I have had to wait for ever for my food,refills on drink, or just to get the check. The waitresses need to do better.

name: Marc Taylor

name: Chris DeHart
text: One of our favorite places to eat! My son has food allergies and they go out of their way to make everything safe for him. Alexa is our favorite waitress and knows everything. Feel free to ask her about the weather, shes always right! Highly recommend this establishment!

text: The customer service was outstanding. She made you feel very welcome. The food was amaxing.

text: Food is great staff outstanding üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç

text: Longstanding pizza chain, same old goodness. Those who remember MM on Piedmont in Atlanta would be at home here, just a bigger menu but same good tasting crust and ingredients. ‚Ä¶More

name: Sarahphim
text: Very good pizza. I got a Wilmington special pie of curried chicken with cucumbers and basil with Thai sweet chili sauce. Pretty delicious! Good parking as well. Unfortunately our waitress messed up our order for one pizza and forgot to put in another pizza which is what knocked it down from 5.

name: Robin Lynn Charlet
text: I have never had a bad experience at the Mellow Mushroom in Wilmington North Carolina! The food is always hot and delicious and served in a timely manner, even when they are packed on a Friday or Saturday night. You can customize just about every Pizza on the menu and they have a gluten free and vegan options as well.

name: Emilie Walker
text: Their Bruschetta is very good. I would gladly go back there for that meal & hopefully try other dishes.

name: Robert Phillips
text: Good food, pleasant staff, quick service. Fun family pizza place.

name: Lynn Righter
text: Great pizza, friendly staff!!  They were very accommodating when we came in with a large group.

name: westoftime
text: Great food and atmosphere

text: best pizza/ beer combo in town. Large draft selection with many local beers. Family friendly and the food is always good.

name: Tony Gliori

name: Nicole Hughes
text: Love this place! Great hoagies, and pizza, they even have a delicious burger. Another bonus is their beer selection.

name: Boyd U.
text: Wonderful food. Very good service. Not thrilled that some of the menu items are named using thinly-veiled, recreational-drug nicknames, but the name of the establishment is a gigantic hint, so I can't complain that I wasn't "warned."  :)

name: Tony Joyce
text: Great pizza and staff!

name: April Quinn
text: Fun, casual atmosphere as the name implies. A very large beer and drink selection, we don't drink but someone who does will be impressed with the selection. The menu had a lot of variety  but just a little hard to understand, I wasn't sure ‚Ä¶More

name: Amy Kostelnik-Insley
text: Great pizza

name: Scott Roe
text: The pizza and service was excellent, will be going back the next time we are in Wilmington.

name: brian enoch
text: I'm vegan and they have so many incredible options to choose from. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The food is fantastic, I love the vegan pizza. Really great place!

name: Jodie Taylor
text: I brought the family there for the 1st time  We ordered a pizza large  And a Calzone.  And some appetizer. The food was good.. Here's what happened the waitress never took anything away from our table when she came with our Food our  table ‚Ä¶More

name: Keelee Johns
text: We got the pizza with BBQ sauce and chicken. It was delicious! The server was attentive and the food came out relatively quick even though they were slammed. The margarita was the worst I've ever had so I won't be ordering one of those again but the beer selection for my friends was great and they really loved all of their beer.

name: Marshall Winthrop
text: Delicious pizza, Great atmosphere, Jacob was a phenomenal server we ask for him to serve us every time, he steadily keeps drinks in our hands and delicious food on our plates every Pengo! 5/5 recommend for the wonderful clean atmosphere, yummy food and excellent service! You have to try the Holy Shiitake pie, it is to DIE for. :)

name: Austin Andrews
text: Best pizza crust on the planet!! Delicious pizzas and plenty of other options. Never disappoints.

name: Christine Coco
text: Delicious.  Great service.  Clean.

name: Cody Carpenter
text: Great food! I'm actually back here today as I write this for my last visit. I got the buffalo chicken calzone and it was wonderful. It was perfectly cooked and had great cheese inside. Also got the pretzel bites which were very good and the butter cheese sauce was Great! The staff were super nice and they helped us so greatly!

name: xXArchBishopXx ttv
text: Love mello mushroom. Great service here was a plus.

name: Patrick Moore
text: Always great and most importantly....they still have Thai Dye pizza (vegan if you want)

name: Jessica Simpson

name: tyler thomas
text: My wife was recommended the Sunset in Paradise for a drink and she loved it, the toasted coconut on the rim was different but so good. The pretzels and beef cheese was super good and the pizzas we ordered were great as well and very cheesy. üòé We will be back.

name: Justin Oberdorf
text: Can't get better pizza in town. The Thai pizza, is to die for. Also have a great beer selection with a lot of local brews on tap.

name: Cole Lundberg
text:
Didn‚Äôt get my order right at all. Didn‚Äôt discount me or even seem to care.
Was good pizza though.

name: C-Lo Nixson
text: Great portions,family friendly environment and heavy on the mellow! I would recommend this establishment to anyone visiting the area. I will definitely be returning

name: George Kelley
text: I'm relatively certain there's not a better pizza in this town.

name: trudy barnes
text: Good food friendly,great service

name: johnny herman
text: My little one was having a bad day so we headed there for some "Pizza Therapy". Staff was great food was good. We had the cheese pizza and the cheese could stretch from on end of the table to another. Good stuff!!

name: Michael Zovistoski
text: Went here for date night and it was the girlfriends first time at mellow mushroom. Waitress Savannah was awesome. Spinach and artichoke dip was on point as well as the calzones. Thanks for the great service! -Mike & Mickey

name: anthony romano
text: Delicious pizza and garlic cheese bread.  Waitress was personable and made our experience enjoyable

name: Andrew Landers
text: Yummy soup and neat ambiance.

name: Nikki Rands
text: Good atmosphere, quick service, great pizza! What else can I say? Try it!

name: Lauren Rosen
text: Wanted to go pick up a quick dinner so ordered a salad, it was wrong, asked for it to be corrected. It was still wrong when I got it back but I didn‚Äôt have the time to attempt to get it corrected a second time.  Pretzels were good

name: Jim Detloff
text: We had my wife's baby shower here. Everything went very smoothly and the food was pretty good.

name: Jack Clifford
text: Great pizza as always.   Always great combinations and really great names for all the different pizzas one can order.  Only complaint is the service is really slow and they weren't that busy.

name: Joe Guide
text: Good pizza and good service. Nothing quite exceptional. Had a pizza for the family. It was good but service and response was about average from This establishment. ‚Ä¶More

name: Athenah
text: Chill place with delicious food. Our server was excellent and helped us veganize our order. We did the pretzels with red sauce which was delicious. For pizza we ordered the follow your heart cheese, pineapple, jalapeno, and bbq tempeh. ‚Ä¶More

name: Drake Moss
text: Shitake pie is worth every f****** penny

name: Doug Kline
text: Good selection of craft beer, including lots from the excellent Wilmington area breweries. Of course the pizza is good, but the salads are fantastic and surprisingly creative. The jerk chicken (on a pizza, sandwich, or salad), in my opinion, is the best in town.

name: Michelle Smithson
text: I love this place. I have been to other mellow mushrooms and this one just has a different vibe and atmosphere. You feel really comfortable and laid back. The food is always great even when compared to others in the chain.

name: Christina Brisson
text: Loved the excitement of the bingo game!

name: Naomi Rivera
text: Fantastic pizza, fun atmosphere.

name: Christy Fox
text: Always great food and staff!!

name: Andrew Phelps
text: Strange experience. Food was perfect, just like any other MM. However, service was awkward and lacking. We sat for about 10 minutes until we even had our drink order taken, another 10 minutes to get drinks. Came very close to just leaving. ‚Ä¶More

name: richelle galeas
text: Fun atmosphere, lots of vegetarian options

name: Sally Howell
text: Always good, used to go to Mellow Mushroom in Atlanta 35 years ago..  Pizza great, terrific choices for beer.  Only regret is y'all got rid of the turkey and cheese hoagie...I love that one.

name: Carla Velez
text: Great food, great service.  Food came out quickly and our waitress was super polite and cheery.  This location was very clean and the outdoor seating is nice.

name: Wilbur Griffin
text: Great food and service

name: Bill with Lindsey Jenkins
text: I love their Pizza

name: Angelica G.
text: Mellow Mushroom is always consistent. The servers were nice and the environment is always fun. Drinks and pizza... a great combination!

name: Lauren Newsome
text: Always great food but service from bar manager was incredible. Personal attention with above and beyond service (and he's not bad to look at üòÅ).

name: Michael Gee
text: Love it! Every one of them is different across the country. It's a chain, but I love the character of each, and the food never disappoints. Give me a Holy Shitake pie or a Tempeh Hoagie and I'm good satisfied every time. Delicious!

name: Jason Kida
text: Great Pizza and live those pretzels bites with beer cheese

name: Daxx-Terry Green
text: Great food and great people. Our sever, Dakota was awesome.

name: Heather Higgs
text: Very pleased with their service. You don't have to wait very long for take out. 15~20 mins Max. Friendly staff and the gluten free pizza is so delicious! I definitely recommend going to this place.

name: Gloria Gibson
text: We had one of their specialty pizzas, very good! Crust is hand tossed. A little costly, but worth it!

name: Ann Manoudakis
text: Excellent pizza! My first visit but won't be my last!!! Good Job guys!!!!

name: Richard Florke
text: Had a terrific time great food and atmosphere!

name: Donna Johns
text: 1st time really never knew what to order..but burger was good seen all the pizza coming out next time we will get one..

name: Katrina Massey
text: Cool place and GREAT food. The pretzel bites are extremely yummy!

name: Lisa Wiley
text: Love the atmosphere, service and food

name: Nathan Borukhovsky
text: Holy shitake is right! Amazing pizza, great service.

name: Andrew Mosso
text: Not bad for a chain restaurant. Pizza was quite good and there were some unique toppings. Good beer selection.

name: D K B
text:
Still the best pizza in town!
You have to check out their remodeled patio & I think it will be ready for the New Year and Spring semester! ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Doering
text: I love their pizza. I get it to go. Always ready on time.

name: tom cleary
text: Nice people and good food.

name: Brittany Kraycirik
text: My boyfriend and I both got food poisoning from this location 2 days ago. I had the gluten free great white and he had the Funky Q BBQ chicken pizza. Both had glasses of water. It hit immediately after.

name: Ciska Lentfert
text: Waitress was super attentive and friendly, she  let us take our time.. food was good ..

name: Adri A
text: Food is very good but a little expensive, worthy also.

name: A F
text: Jacob is the best employee/server they have! He was very good with checking back in and had a great sense of humor

name: Benjamin Keefer
text: Pizza, appetizers, and great service. An amazing choice of pizzas I can only find at Mellow Mushroom. A must eat destination for just about any situation.

name: Hillary Pearce
